exceptions.tactic: apply ltT_trans with (pX a (pX b pO) : Term A n).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) consA := cons : mon n -> list (mon n) -> list (mon n) nilA := nil : list (mon n) listA := list (mon n) : Set DescA := Desc (mon n) ltM : list (mon n) -> Prop l : list (Term A n) a, b : Term A n H : olist (l ++ pX a (pX b pO)) The term "pX a (pX b pO)" has type "list (Term A n)" while it is expected to have type "Term A n".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) consA := cons : mon n -> list (mon n) -> list (mon n) nilA := nil : list (mon n) listA := list (mon n) : Set DescA := Desc (mon n) ltM : list (mon n) -> Prop l : list (Term A n) a, b : Term A n H : olist (l ++ pX a (pX b pO)) Unable to unify "olist (l ++ pX a (pX b pO))" with "ltT b a".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) consA := cons : mon n -> list (mon n) -> list (mon n) nilA := nil : list (mon n) listA := list (mon n) : Set DescA := Desc (mon n) ltM : list (mon n) -> Prop l : list (Term A n) a, b : Term A n H : olist (l ++ pX a (pX b pO)) Unable to unify "Desc (mon n) ltM (fP (pX ?M1548 (pX ?M1549 pO)))" with "ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a)".

original: intros l a b H. apply ltT_trans with (pX a (pX b pO) : Term A n). - apply H. - apply olistOne.
